DOC.criteria: HEALTHY CONTROLS HOMAIR ( fast ( glucose x insulin ) /405 ) < 1.8 Not one following : Waist circumference > 40 inch ( men ) > 35 inch ( woman ) Triglycerides > 150 mg/dL HDL < 40 mg/dL ( men ) < 50 mg/dL ( woman ) Blood pressure > 135/85 Fasting glucose > 100 mg/dL INSULIN RESISTANT HOMAIR > 2.0 And least three follow : Waist circumference > 40 inch ( men ) > 35 inch ( woman ) Triglycerides > 150 mg/dL HDL < 40 mg/dL ( men ) < 50 mg/dL ( woman ) Blood pressure > 135/85 Fasting glucose > 100 mg/dL MAJOR DEPRESSION , METABOLICALLY HEALTHY Meets criterion MDD SCID5 evaluation HOMAIR < 1.8 Not one following : Waist circumference > 40 inch ( men ) > 35 inch ( woman ) Triglycerides > 150 mg/dL HDL < 40 mg/dL ( men ) < 50 mg/dL ( woman ) Blood pressure > 135/85 Fasting glucose > 100 mg/dL MAJOR DEPRESSION , INSULIN RESISTANT Meets criteria MDD SCID5 evaluation HOMAIR > 2.0 And least three follow : Waist circumference > 40 inch ( men ) > 35 inch ( woman ) Triglycerides > 150 mg/dL HDL < 40 mg/dL ( men ) < 50 mg/dL ( woman ) Blood pressure > 135/85 Fasting glucose > 100 mg/dL History mania psychosis Current suicidal ideation Alcohol substance abuse include cannabis use ( current last three month ) Early onset dementia etiology Medical condition know significant effect mood ( e.g . Stroke current hypothyroid state ) Unstable medical illness ( e.g . Delirium , uncontrolled DM , uncontrolled cardiovascular illness ) Use high dos benzodiazepine ( > 2mg lorazepam/day equivalent ) Given high comorbidity ( 80 % ) MDD anxiety disorder , participant comorbid anxiety disorder include study long clinical presentation suggest depression precedes onset anxiety Current lifetime history cancer , chronic kidney liver condition , type I II diabetes Current lifetime use glucocorticoid medication > 1 month Previous cerebrovascular accident trauma involve loss consciousness Previous neurosurgery history neurological condition Pregnancy ( female ) Claustrophobia Ferrous metallic implant surgically place medical device clear safety 3Tesla MRI strength Positive Hepatitis C serology know viral infection may induce insulin resistance Peripheral vascular disease Liver , kidney , active blood disease Peripheral neuropathy Fasting glucose > 126 mg/dL Currently take medication alter glucose homeostasis ( steroid , glucocorticoid , nicotinic acid ) Currently take thiazolidinediones insulin Females currently hormone replacement therapy ( HRT ) less 6 month Being leave hand Use antidepressant medication within past two week ( six week fluoxetine ) Suicide risk Current use stimulant , antipsychotic medication , mood stabilizer , cognitive enhancer , statin , glucocorticoid , steroid , nicotinic acid , thiazolidinediones , insulin , metformin , diabetes medication ( e.g . gliptins ) , HIV medication .
